C I R C U L A R   NO.  7  /2003 
 
 
Sub: Cockpit door to be closed during the flight. 
 
 
It has been observed by the Hon’ble Minister of Civil Aviation during the 
recent briefing meeting that instructions of BCAS on keeping the cockpit door 
closed during flight are not being followed in many of the flights. 
 
In order to counter the different types of threats from perpetrators, it is 
essential  to deny a perpetrator access to the cockpit through out flight 
operational procedures. It is, therefore, reiterated that instructions issued vide 
this Bureau  AVSEC Order No. 8/2001 dated 16.11.2001 may be strictly followed 
by all concerned. A copy of AVSEC order is enclosed for reference. 
 
 
 
(R.K. Singh) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Ref NO.CAS-1(1)/98-DIV-I  Date: 13.3.2003
